ygData.subject: Re: neglected melee skills..
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah..  I dont have problems anymore with mobs killing me.  I m just worried that I wont be able to use the Fanged Skull Stilletto later on, if I dont improve my
ygData.messageBody:
Ah.. I dont have problems anymore with mobs killing me. I'm just worried that I wont be able to use the Fanged Skull Stilletto later on, if I dont improve my skills now. I'll take your advice though and keep piercing. Thanks for giving it.

Also.. oops. Sorry all. I'm on both lists.. and accidentally sent it to the wrong one. =/

Drev

> ----------
> From: mstokes[SMTP:mstokes@...]
> Reply To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 8:57 AM
> To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] neglected melee skills..
>
> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Your skill will improve with time. I ran into this problem myself with 1H Blunt. The best solution is to follow this procedure.
>
> 1) Find a group
> 2) Attack a mob (monster)
> 3) wait until the tanks get a few hits in
> 4) Place yourself BEHIND the mob
> 5) Start swinging your fang
> 6) When the mob is low enough on HP's, step behind the tanks and burn as usual
>
> The only time this doesn't work is against semi intelligent mobs who have a natural distaste for casting classes. You'll find this out when they turn around and attack you. If this happens, just step back. Getting behind the mob is important
> because you get a "chance to hit" bonus, and this will raise your skill faster.
>
> Good Luck, and by the way, this question is a little bit off topic. You may be better off posting it to eq_wizards@onelist.com (another very active mailling list)
>
>
> "McCartney, Michael R" wrote:
>
> > From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
> >
> > I forgot to work on my piercing skills for about 4 levels... then when I went back to using a Giant snake fang.. it wont increase my skill.. Do I have to put some practice points into it? Or does it just take longer to get back to increasing?
> >
> > Drev, level 16 wizard on Tarew Marr
> >
> >
>
>

> With more than 14 million emails exchanged daily...
